â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Return to the world of TRON with TRON RUN/r, a new lightning fast,      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ action-adventure racing game with a twist! Blaze through dynamic        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ circuits, facing-off against virulent adversaries while taking on all   â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ challengers. Pack your loadouts with dozens of combinations of cycles,  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ suits and powerups. Hone your DISC and CYCLE skills on the 32 included  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ levels, then challenge your friends to the grueling STREAM program that â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ throws endless combinations of modes and levels at you until you crash  â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ - how long can you survive? The one who outlasts all tops the           â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ leaderboard! New music from EDM godfather Giorgio Moroder and Raney     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Shockne, and remixes by Autechre, Bibio, patten, Joywave and others     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ power you through this dazzling TRON universe. Just when you think      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
